facts.name: Mars
facts.description: Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun and the second-smallest planet in the Solar System, being larger than only Mercury.

facts.name: Mars Surface
facts.description: The surface of Mars is primarily composed of tholeiitic basalt, although parts are more silica-rich than typical basalt.

facts.name: The Sun
facts.description: The Sun is the star at the center of the Solar System. It is a nearly perfect sphere of hot plasma, heated to incandescence by nuclear fusion reactions in its core.
